Detailed Description

The primary class to hold all EM operations.

bool CPrimeEM::EMEstimate ( CEMSeed &  seed  ) 

the function to get EM's estimate with a specific initial seed

Start EM from the initial seed to get estimates for a given data set, all the posterior information will be calculated.

Parameters:
seed - the specific initial seed
Returns:
true if there is no error, false otherwise
Parameters:
seed - the initial seed for EM to start with
Returns:
true if no error, false otherwise

bool CPrimeEM::goPrimeEM (  ) 

The function to run EM for genotyping, function only works for three cluster cases.

Run EM for genotyping, first generate variable number of EM seeds based some prior information and the data to be classified, then use EM to get estimates starting from each seeds this function only works for three cluster cases as it is designed for genotyping only.

Returns:
true if there is no error, false otherwise

Definition at line 665 of file PrimeEM.cpp.
